chains.des: ChainCloud is a platform that can help you to connect your website or application with the most popular blockchain assets (Bitcoin, Ethereum, EOS, USDT and so on).

clients.RenRenBit: RenRenBit is a powerful bitcoin trade platform for buying and selling bitcoins instantly.
clients.BTC123: BTC123 is the most popular bitcoin navigation site with the real-time price/kline, news and other informations.
clients.BitcoinWorld: BitcoinWorld is the first ever p2p trading platform that offers hedging,a tool which can be used to hedge against the price volatility and lock in profit, and offers accelerator to make the transaction confimed faster.
clients.Bitpie: Bitpie is developed by Bither team. With bitpie, you can have a secured bitcoin wallet as simple as possible, and you can also buy/sell bitcoins in an easy way.

features.Cold Receiving API_des: You can easily get thousands of COLD addresses in a secured way and monitor related transactions with ChainCloud's Cold Receiving API.
features.Hot Sending API_des: With the ‘Actually Cold but looks like Hot’ Wallet solution, you can safely provide real-time withdrawal or payment services to your customers.
features.Alert System_des: ChainCloud has a sophisticated alert system that can warn administrator quickly and effectively.
features.Financial Report_des: With the comprehensive report API, you can easily verify the financial data of your system, and audit periodically.
